Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that presidential inaugurations have been held in front of the U.S. Capitol, not in the Rose Garden, since the 1980s.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove its validity.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that President Trump will be hosting an alternative inauguration, which is not supported by any credible information.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim can be explained as a fake email created by someone who altered a genuine email screenshot.
